set(xgc_headers
  XGCCommon.h
)

target_sources(fides PRIVATE
  ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/XGCCommon.cxx)

    DROP_UNUSED_SYMBOLS
    DEVICE_SOURCES XGCCommon.cxx)

install(FILES ${xgc_headers}
  DESTINATION ${FIDES_INSTALL_INCLUDE_DIR}/xgc)
